variable.name: tp_took
variable.description: Customizes the f_took trigger. Item can be: quad, pent, ring, suit, ra, ya, ga, mh, health, lg, rl, gl, sng, ng, ssg, pack, cells, rockets, nails, shells, flag, armor, weapons, powerups, ammo, all, default, none Item names can be customized with tp_name_item Examples: tp_took powerups ra ya lg rl mh flag (same as "default") tp_took all -ammo (report everything but ammo) tp_took +gl (add grenade launcher to pickup list) alias f_took "say_team took %i"
